======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9553
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161122)
Reference: BID:95853
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95853
Reference: CONFIRM:http://swa.sophos.com/rn/swa/concepts/ReleaseNotes_4.3.1.html
Reference: CONFIRM:https://community.sophos.com/products/web-appliance/b/blog/posts/release-of-swa-version-4-3-1
Reference: MISC:http://pastebin.com/DUYuN0U5

The Sophos Web Appliance (version 4.2.1.3) is vulnerable to two Remote
Command Injection vulnerabilities affecting its web administrative
interface. These vulnerabilities occur in the MgrReport.php
(/controllers/MgrReport.php) component responsible for blocking and
unblocking IP addresses from accessing the device. The device doesn't
properly escape the information passed in the variables 'unblockip'
and 'blockip' before calling the shell_exec() function which allows
for system commands to be injected into the device. The code
erroneously suggests that the information handled is protected by
utilizing the variable name 'escapedips' - however this was not the
case. The Sophos ID is NSWA-1258.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9554
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161122)
Reference: BID:95858
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95858
Reference: CONFIRM:https://community.sophos.com/products/web-appliance/b/blog/posts/release-of-swa-version-4-3-1
Reference: MISC:http://pastebin.com/UB8Ye6ZU

The Sophos Web Appliance Remote / Secure Web Gateway server (version
4.2.1.3) is vulnerable to a Remote Command Injection vulnerability in
its web administrative interface. These vulnerabilities occur in
MgrDiagnosticTools.php (/controllers/MgrDiagnosticTools.php), in the
component responsible for performing diagnostic tests with the UNIX
wget utility. The application doesn't properly escape the information
passed in the 'url' variable before calling the executeCommand class
function ($this->dtObj->executeCommand). This function calls exec()
with unsanitized user input allowing for remote command injection. The
page that contains the vulnerabilities,
/controllers/MgrDiagnosticTools.php, is accessed by a built-in command
answered by the administrative interface. The command that calls to
that vulnerable page (passed in the 'section' parameter) is:
'configuration'. Exploitation of this vulnerability yields shell
access to the remote machine under the 'spiderman' user account.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00070.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3197

Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3205
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00076.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3206
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00077.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3247
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00087.html

The sctp_sf_ootb function in net/sctp/sm_statefuns.c in the Linux
kernel before 4.8.8 lacks chunk-length checking for the first chunk,
which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-
bounds slab access) or possibly have unspecified other impact via
crafted SCTP data.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9567
Status: Candidate

Reference: BID:94494
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94494
Reference: CONFIRM:http://security.samsungmobile.com/smrupdate.html#SMR-NOV-2016

The mDNIe system service on Samsung Mobile S7 devices with M(6.0)
software does not properly restrict setmDNIeScreenCurtain API calls,
enabling attackers to control a device's screen. This can be exploited
via a crafted application to eavesdrop after phone shutdown or record
a conversation. The Samsung ID is SVE-2016-6343.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9575
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)

Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0001
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0001.html

Ipa versions 4.2.x, 4.3.x before 4.3.3 and 4.4.x before 4.4.3 did not
properly check the user's permissions while modifying certificate
profiles in IdM's certprofile-mod command. An authenticated,
unprivileged attacker could use this flaw to modify profiles to issue
certificates with arbitrary naming or key usage information and
subsequently use such certificates for other attacks.

kernel before 4.8.14 does not properly restrict the type of iterator,

access to a /dev/sg device.

Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1842

arch/x86/kvm/vmx.c in the Linux kernel through 4.9 mismanages the #BP
and #OF exceptions, which allows guest OS users to cause a denial of
service (guest OS crash) by declining to handle an exception thrown by
an L2 guest.

Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:3455
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:3456
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:3456
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:3458
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:3458

Undertow in Red Hat wildfly before version 11.0.0.Beta1 is vulnerable
to a resource exhaustion resulting in a denial of service. Undertow
keeps a cache of seen HTTP headers in persistent connections. It was
found that this cache can easily exploited to fill memory with
garbage, up to "max-headers" (default 200) * "max-header-size"
(default 1MB) per active TCP connection.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9590
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:95448
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95448
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9590
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0200
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0200.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0359
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0359.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0361
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0361.html

puppet-swift before versions 8.2.1, 9.4.4 is vulnerable to an
information-disclosure in Red Hat OpenStack Platform director's
installation of Object Storage (swift). During installation, the
Puppet script responsible for deploying the service incorrectly
removes and recreates the proxy-server.conf file with world-readable
permissions.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9591
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:94952

Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1208

JasPer before version 2.0.12 is vulnerable to a use-after-free in the
way it decodes certain JPEG 2000 image files resulting in a crash on
the application using JasPer.


Current Votes:

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9592
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:94991
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94991
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9592

openshift before versions 3.3.1.11, 3.2.1.23, 3.4 is vulnerable to a
flaw when a volume fails to detach, which causes the delete operation
to fail with 'VolumeInUse' error. Since the delete operation is
retried every 30 seconds for each volume, this could lead to a denial
of service attack as the number of API requests being sent to the
cloud-provider exceeds the API's rate-limit.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================

Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2018:0336
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2018:0336

foreman-debug before version 1.15.0 is vulnerable to a flaw in
foreman-debug's logging. An attacker with access to the foreman log
file would be able to view passwords, allowing them to access those
systems.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9594
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)

Reference: MISC:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9594
Reference: SECTRACK:1037528
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037528

curl before version 7.52.1 is vulnerable to an uninitialized random in
libcurl's internal function that returns a good 32bit random value.
Having a weak or virtually non-existent random value makes the
operations that use it vulnerable.

======================================================

A flaw was found in katello-debug before 3.4.0 where certain scripts
and log files used insecure temporary files. A local user could
exploit this flaw to conduct a symbolic-link attack, allowing them to
overwrite the contents of arbitrary files.

libxml2, as used in Red Hat JBoss Core Services and when in recovery
mode, allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service
(stack consumption) via a crafted XML document.  NOTE: this
vulnerability exists because of an incorrect fix for CVE-2016-3627.

It was found that Red Hat JBoss Core Services erratum RHSA-2016:2957
for CVE-2016-3705 did not actually include the fix for the issue found
in libxml2, making it vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack due to
a Stack Overflow. This is a regression CVE for the same issue as
CVE-2016-3705.

libxml2, as used in Red Hat JBoss Core Services, allows context-
dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read
and application crash) via a crafted XML document. NOTE: this
vulnerability exists because of a missing fix for CVE-2016-4483.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9599
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9599
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0025
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0025.html

puppet-tripleo before versions 5.5.0, 6.2.0 is vulnerable to an
access-control flaw in the IPtables rules management, which allowed
the creation of TCP/UDP rules with empty port values. If SSL is
enabled, a malicious user could use these open ports to gain access to
unauthorized resources.

JasPer before version 2.0.10 is vulnerable to a null pointer
dereference was found in the decoded creation of JPEG 2000 image
files. A specially crafted file could cause an application using
JasPer to crash.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9601
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:97095
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97095
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.ghostscript.com/?p=jbig2dec.git;a=commit;h=e698d5c11d27212aa1098bc5b1673a3378563092
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugs.ghostscript.com/show_bug.cgi?id=697457
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3817
Reference: URL:https://www.debian.org/security/2017/dsa-3817
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201706-24
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201706-24
Reference: MISC:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9601

ghostscript before version 9.21 is vulnerable to a heap based buffer
overflow that was found in the ghostscript
jbig2_decode_gray_scale_image function which is used to decode
halftone segments in a JBIG2 image. A document (PostScript or PDF)
with an embedded, specially crafted, jbig2 image could trigger a
segmentation fault in ghostscript.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9602
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:95461
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95461
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9602
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201704-01
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201704-01
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20180906 [SECURITY] [DLA 1497-1] qemu security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/09/msg00007.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20170117 CVE-2016-9602 Qemu: 9p: virtfs allows guest to access host filesystem

Reference: MLIST:[qemu-devel] 20170220 [PATCH 00/29] 9pfs: local: fix vulnerability to symlink attacks

Reference: SECTRACK:1037604
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037604

Qemu before version 2.9 is vulnerable to an improper link following
when built with the VirtFS. A privileged user inside guest could use
this flaw to access host file system beyond the shared folder and
potentially escalating their privileges on a host.

Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0982
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0982
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0983
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0983
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0984
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0984
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0985
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0985
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0987
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0987
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0988
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0988
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1205
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1205
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1206
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1206
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1441
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1441
Reference: SECTRACK:1038023
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038023

A heap buffer overflow flaw was found in QEMU's Cirrus CLGD 54xx VGA
emulator's VNC display driver support before 2.9; the issue could
occur when a VNC client attempted to update its display after a VGA
operation is performed by a guest. A privileged user/process inside a
guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMU process or, potentially,
execute arbitrary code on the host with privileges of the QEMU
process.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9604
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:102135
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/102135
Reference: CONFIRM:http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2016/CVE-2016-9604.html
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.novell.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1035576
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9604
Reference: CONFIRM:https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=ee8f844e3c5a73b999edf733df1c529d6503ec2f
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1842
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1842
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2077
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2077
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2669
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2669

It was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.11-rc8 that root can
gain direct access to an internal keyring, such as '.dns_resolver' in
RHEL-7 or '.builtin_trusted_keys' upstream, by joining it as its
session keyring. This allows root to bypass module signature
verification by adding a new public key of its own devising to the
keyring.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9605
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2016-9605

A flaw was found in cobbler software component version 2.6.11-1. It
suffers from an invalid parameter validation vulnerability, leading
the arbitrary file reading. The flaw is triggered by navigating to a
vulnerable URL via cobbler-web on a default installation.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9626
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/tats/w3m/blob/master/ChangeLog
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/tats/w3m/issues/37
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161123 Re: CVE request: w3m - multiple vulnerabilities
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/24/1

An issue was discovered in the Tatsuya Kinoshita w3m fork before
0.5.3-33. Infinite recursion vulnerability in w3m allows remote
attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTML page.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9634
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:94499
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94499
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=774834
Reference: CONFIRM:https://gstreamer.freedesktop.org/releases/1.10/#1.10.2
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3723
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3723
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3724
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3724
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201705-10
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201705-10
Reference: MISC:https://scarybeastsecurity.blogspot.com/2016/11/0day-exploit-advancing-exploitation.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161123 Re: CVE Request: gstreamer plugins
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/24/2
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2975
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2975.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0019
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0019.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0020
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0020.html

Heap-based buffer overflow in the flx_decode_delta_fli function in
gst/flx/gstflxdec.c in the FLIC decoder in GStreamer before 1.10.2
allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of
service (application crash) via the start_line parameter.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9635
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:94499
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94499
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=774834
Reference: CONFIRM:https://gstreamer.freedesktop.org/releases/1.10/#1.10.2
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3723
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3723
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3724
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3724
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201705-10
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201705-10
Reference: MISC:https://scarybeastsecurity.blogspot.com/2016/11/0day-exploit-advancing-exploitation.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161123 Re: CVE Request: gstreamer plugins
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/24/2
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2975
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2975.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0019
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0019.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0020
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0020.html

Heap-based buffer overflow in the flx_decode_delta_fli function in
gst/flx/gstflxdec.c in the FLIC decoder in GStreamer before 1.10.2
allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of
service (application crash) by providing a 'skip count' that goes
beyond initialized buffer.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9636
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:94499
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94499
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=774834
Reference: CONFIRM:https://gstreamer.freedesktop.org/releases/1.10/#1.10.2
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3723
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3723
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3724
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3724
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201705-10
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201705-10
Reference: MISC:https://scarybeastsecurity.blogspot.com/2016/11/0day-exploit-advancing-exploitation.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161123 Re: CVE Request: gstreamer plugins
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/24/2
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2975
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2975.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0019
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0019.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0020
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0020.html

Heap-based buffer overflow in the flx_decode_delta_fli function in
gst/flx/gstflxdec.c in the FLIC decoder in GStreamer before 1.10.2
allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of
service (application crash) by providing a 'write count' that goes
beyond the initialized buffer.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9637
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: BID:94699
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94699
Reference: CONFIRM:http://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-199.html
Reference: CONFIRM:https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX219136
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201612-56
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201612-56
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20180206 [SECURITY] [DLA 1270-1] xen security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/02/msg00005.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2963
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2963.html
Reference: SECTRACK:1037397
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037397

The (1) ioport_read and (2) ioport_write functions in Xen, when qemu
is used as a device model within Xen, might allow local x86 HVM guest
OS administrators to gain qemu process privileges via vectors
involving an out-of-range ioport access.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9638
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161124)
Reference: BID:95009
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95009
Reference: MISC:http://www.nes.fr/securitylab/index.php/2016/12/02/privilege-escalation-on-bmc-patrol
Reference: SECTRACK:1037385
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037385

In BMC Patrol before 9.13.10.02, the binary "listguests64" is
configured with the setuid bit. However, when executing it, it will
look for a binary named "virsh" using the PATH environment variable.
The "listguests64" program will then run "virsh" using root
privileges. This allows local users to elevate their privileges to
root.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9639
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161125)
Reference: BID:94553
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94553
Reference: CONFIRM:https://docs.saltstack.com/en/2015.8/ref/configuration/master.html#rotate-aes-key

Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/25/2
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161125 Re: CVE Request: salt confidentiality issue
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/25/3

Salt before 2015.8.11 allows deleted minions to read or write to
minions with the same id, related to caching.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9643
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161126)
Reference: BID:94559
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94559
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201706-15
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201706-15
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161126 CVE Request: resource exhaustion in regex expression handling in WebKit
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/26/2
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161126 Re: CVE Request: resource exhaustion in regex expression handling in WebKit
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/26/5
Reference: SECTRACK:1038137
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038137

The regex code in Webkit 2.4.11 allows remote attackers to cause a
denial of service (memory consumption) as demonstrated in a large
number of ($ (open parenthesis and dollar) followed by {-2,16} and a
large number of +) (plus close parenthesis).


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9644
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161127)
Reference: BID:94545
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94545
Reference: CONFIRM:https://lwn.net/Articles/705220/
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161107 Re: Re: kernel: fix minor infoleak in get_user_ex()
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/07/4
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3146-1
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3146-1
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3146-2
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3146-2

The __get_user_asm_ex macro in arch/x86/include/asm/uaccess.h in the
Linux kernel 4.4.22 through 4.4.28 contains extended asm statements
that are incompatible with the exception table, which allows local
users to obtain root access on non-SMEP platforms via a crafted
application.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of incorrect
backporting of the CVE-2016-9178 patch to older kernels.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9645
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161129)
Reference: MISC:https://ikiwiki.info/security/#cve-2016-9645
Reference: MISC:https://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=148304341511854&w=2
Reference: MISC:https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-9645

The fix for ikiwiki for CVE-2016-10026 was incomplete resulting in
editing restriction bypass for git revert when using git versions
older than 2.8.0. This has been fixed in 3.20161229.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9646
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161129)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://ikiwiki.info/security/#cve-2016-9646
Reference: CONFIRM:https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-9646
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3760
Reference: URL:https://www.debian.org/security/2017/dsa-3760
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161229 ikiwiki: CVE-2016-9645 (incomplete fix for CVE-2016-10026), CVE-2016-9646 (commit metadata forgery)
Reference: URL:https://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=148304341511854&w=2

ikiwiki before 3.20161229 incorrectly called the
CGI::FormBuilder->field method (similar to the CGI->param API that led
to Bugzilla's CVE-2014-1572), which can be abused to lead to commit
metadata forgery.

None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9650
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161129)
Reference: BID:94633
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94633
Reference: CONFIRM:https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2016/12/stable-channel-update-for-desktop.html

Blink in Google Chrome prior to 55.0.2883.75 for Mac, Windows and
Linux, and 55.0.2883.84 for Android incorrectly handled iframes, which
allowed a remote attacker to bypass a no-referrer policy via a crafted
HTML page.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9651
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161129)
Reference: BID:94633
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94633
Reference: CONFIRM:https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2016/12/stable-channel-update-for-desktop.html

A missing check for whether a property of a JS object is private in V8
in Google Chrome prior to 55.0.2883.75 allowed a remote attacker to
execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9682
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:96375
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96375
Reference: CONFIRM:http://documents.software.dell.com/sonicwall-sma-100-series/8.1.0.7/release-notes/resolved-issues?ParentProduct=868
Reference: CONFIRM:https://psirt.global.sonicwall.com/vuln-detail/SNWLID-2016-0003
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:42342
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/42342/

The SonicWall Secure Remote Access server (version 8.1.0.2-14sv) is
vulnerable to two Remote Command Injection vulnerabilities in its web
administrative interface. These vulnerabilities occur in the
diagnostics CGI (/cgi-bin/diagnostics) component responsible for
emailing out information about the state of the system. The
application doesn't properly escape the information passed in the
'tsrDeleteRestartedFile' or 'currentTSREmailTo' variables before
making a call to system(), allowing for remote command injection.
Exploitation of this vulnerability yields shell access to the remote
machine under the nobody user account.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9683
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:96375
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96375
Reference: CONFIRM:http://documents.software.dell.com/sonicwall-sma-100-series/8.1.0.7/release-notes/resolved-issues?ParentProduct=868
Reference: CONFIRM:https://psirt.global.sonicwall.com/vuln-detail/SNWLID-2016-0004
Reference: MISC:http://pastebin.com/eJbeXgBr

The SonicWall Secure Remote Access server (version 8.1.0.2-14sv) is
vulnerable to a Remote Command Injection vulnerability in its web
administrative interface. This vulnerability occurs in the
'extensionsettings' CGI (/cgi-bin/extensionsettings) component
responsible for handling some of the server's internal configurations.
The CGI application doesn't properly escape the information it's
passed when processing a particular multi-part form request involving
scripts. The filename of the 'scriptname' variable is read in
unsanitized before a call to system() is performed - allowing for
remote command injection. Exploitation of this vulnerability yields
shell access to the remote machine under the nobody user account. This
is SonicWall Issue ID 181195.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9684
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:96375
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96375
Reference: CONFIRM:http://documents.software.dell.com/sonicwall-sma-100-series/8.1.0.7/release-notes/resolved-issues?ParentProduct=868
Reference: CONFIRM:https://psirt.global.sonicwall.com/vuln-detail/SNWLID-2016-0005
Reference: MISC:http://pastebin.com/g1e2qU6N

The SonicWall Secure Remote Access server (version 8.1.0.2-14sv) is
vulnerable to a Remote Command Injection vulnerability in its web
administrative interface. This vulnerability occurs in the 'viewcert'
CGI (/cgi-bin/viewcert) component responsible for processing SSL
certificate information. The CGI application doesn't properly escape
the information it's passed in the 'CERT' variable before a call to
system() is performed - allowing for remote command injection.
Exploitation of this vulnerability yields shell access to the remote
machine under the nobody user account.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9685
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:94593
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94593
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=2e83b79b2d6c78bf1b4aa227938a214dcbddc83f
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/ChangeLog-4.5.1
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1396941
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/2e83b79b2d6c78bf1b4aa227938a214dcbddc83f
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161130 cve-request: linux kernel - memory leak in xfs attribute mechanism.
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/11/30/1
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1842
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1842
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2077
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2077
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2669
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2669

Multiple memory leaks in error paths in fs/xfs/xfs_attr_list.c in the
Linux kernel before 4.5.1 allow local users to cause a denial of
service (memory consumption) via crafted XFS filesystem operations.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Name: CVE-2016-9686
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://puppet.com/security/cve/cve-2016-9686

The Puppet Communications Protocol (PCP) Broker incorrectly validates
message header sizes. An attacker could use this to crash the PCP
Broker, preventing commands from being sent to agents. This is
resolved in Puppet Enterprise 2016.4.3 and 2016.5.2.

Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161201)
Reference: BID:98337
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/98337
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21998014

IBM WebSphere Cast Iron Solution 7.0.0 and 7.5.0.0 is vulnerable to
External Service Interaction attack, caused by improper validation of
user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this
vulnerability to induce the application to perform server-side DNS
lookups or HTTP requests to arbitrary domain names. By submitting
suitable payloads, an attacker can cause the application server to
attack other systems that it can interact with. IBM X-Force ID:
119516.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9754
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161201)
Reference: BID:95278
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95278
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=59643d1535eb220668692a5359de22545af579f6
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/ChangeLog-4.6.1
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/59643d1535eb220668692a5359de22545af579f6
Reference: CONFIRM:https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/2017-01-01.html

The ring_buffer_resize function in kernel/trace/ring_buffer.c in the
profiling subsystem in the Linux kernel before 4.6.1 mishandles
certain integer calculations, which allows local users to gain
privileges by writing to the /sys/kernel/debug/tracing/buffer_size_kb
file.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9755
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161201)
Reference: BID:94626
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94626
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=9b57da0630c9fd36ed7a20fc0f98dc82cc0777fa
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1400904
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/9b57da0630c9fd36ed7a20fc0f98dc82cc0777fa
Reference: CONFIRM:https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/syzkaller/GFbGpX7nTEo
Reference: MLIST:[netdev] 20161130 [PATCH 10/11] netfilter: ipv6: nf_defrag: drop mangled skb on ream error
Reference: URL:https://www.spinics.net/lists/netdev/msg407525.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161201 CVE Request: Linux: net: out-of-bounds due do a signedness issue when defragging ipv6
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/01/10

The netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel before 4.9 mishandles IPv6
reassembly, which allows local users to cause a denial of service
(integer overflow, out-of-bounds write, and GPF) or possibly have
unspecified other impact via a crafted application that makes socket,
connect, and writev system calls, related to
net/ipv6/netfilter/nf_conntrack_reasm.c and
net/ipv6/netfilter/nf_defrag_ipv6_hooks.c.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9756
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161201)
Reference: BID:94615
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94615
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=2117d5398c81554fbf803f5fd1dc55eb78216c0c
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/ChangeLog-4.8.12
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1400468
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/2117d5398c81554fbf803f5fd1dc55eb78216c0c
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161201 CVE request: Kernel: kvm: stack memory information leakage
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/01/1
Reference: SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2017:0002
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2017-01/msg00000.html

arch/x86/kvm/emulate.c in the Linux kernel before 4.8.12 does not
properly initialize Code Segment (CS) in certain error cases, which
allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel stack
memory via a crafted application.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9757
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94996
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94996
Reference: CONFIRM:https://help.rapid7.com/nexpose/en-us/release-notes/#6.4.13

In the Create Tags page of the Rapid7 Nexpose version 6.4.12 user
interface, any authenticated user who has the capability to create
tags can inject cross-site scripting (XSS) elements in the tag name
field. Once this tag is viewed in the Tag Detail page of the Rapid7
Nexpose 6.4.12 UI by another authenticated user, the script is run in
that user's browser context.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9772
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94651
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94651
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.openafs.org/pages/security/OPENAFS-SA-2016-003.txt
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: CVE Request: OpenAFS: directory information leaks (OPENAFS-SA-2016-003)
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/9

OpenAFS 1.6.19 and earlier allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive
directory information via vectors involving the (1) client cache
partition, (2) fileserver vice partition, or (3) certain RPC
responses.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9773
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: MISC:https://blogs.gentoo.org/ago/2016/12/01/imagemagick-heap-based-buffer-overflow-in-ispixelgray-pixel-accessor-h-incomplete-fix-for-cve-2016-9556/
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161201 imagemagick: heap-based buffer overflow in IsPixelGray (pixel-accessor.h) (Incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9556)
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/01/4
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: Re: imagemagick: heap-based buffer overflow in IsPixelGray (pixel-accessor.h) (Incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9556)
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/12
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: imagemagick: heap-based buffer overflow in IsPixelGray (pixel-accessor.h) (Incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9556)
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/11

Heap-based buffer overflow in the IsPixelGray function in
MagickCore/pixel-accessor.h in ImageMagick 7.0.3.8 allows remote
attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via a
crafted image file.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an
incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9556.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9774
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94643
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94643
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=845393
Reference: CONFIRM:https://security.netapp.com/advisory/ntap-20180731-0002/
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3738
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3738
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3739
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3739
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 CVE request: tomcat privilege escalations in Debian packaging
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/5
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: CVE request: tomcat privilege escalations in Debian packaging
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/10
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3177-1
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3177-1
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3177-2
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3177-2

The postinst script in the tomcat6 package before 6.0.45+dfsg-1~deb7u4
on Debian wheezy, before 6.0.35-1ubuntu3.9 on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and on
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS; the tomcat7 package before 7.0.28-4+deb7u8 on Debian
wheezy, before 7.0.56-3+deb8u6 on Debian jessie, before
7.0.52-1ubuntu0.8 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, and on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, 16.04
LTS, and 16.10; and the tomcat8 package before 8.0.14-1+deb8u5 on
Debian jessie, before 8.0.32-1ubuntu1.3 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, before
8.0.37-1ubuntu0.1 on Ubuntu 16.10, and before 8.0.38-2ubuntu1 on
Ubuntu 17.04 might allow local users with access to the tomcat account
to obtain sensitive information or gain root privileges via a symlink
attack on the Catalina localhost directory.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9775
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94643
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94643
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=845385
Reference: URL:https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=845385
Reference: CONFIRM:https://security.netapp.com/advisory/ntap-20180731-0002/
Reference: URL:https://security.netapp.com/advisory/ntap-20180731-0002/
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3738
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3738
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3739
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3739
Reference: MISC:https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpuApr2021.html
Reference: URL:https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpuApr2021.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 CVE request: tomcat privilege escalations in Debian packaging
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/5
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: CVE request: tomcat privilege escalations in Debian packaging
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/10
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3177-1
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3177-1
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3177-2
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3177-2

The postrm script in the tomcat6 package before 6.0.45+dfsg-1~deb7u3
on Debian wheezy, before 6.0.45+dfsg-1~deb8u1 on Debian jessie, before
6.0.35-1ubuntu3.9 on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS; the
tomcat7 package before 7.0.28-4+deb7u7 on Debian wheezy, before
7.0.56-3+deb8u6 on Debian jessie, before 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.8 on Ubuntu
14.04 LTS, and on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, 16.04 LTS, and 16.10; and the
tomcat8 package before 8.0.14-1+deb8u5 on Debian jessie, before
8.0.32-1ubuntu1.3 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, before 8.0.37-1ubuntu0.1 on
Ubuntu 16.10, and before 8.0.38-2ubuntu1 on Ubuntu 17.04 might allow
local users with access to the tomcat account to gain root privileges
via a setgid program in the Catalina directory, as demonstrated by
/etc/tomcat8/Catalina/attack.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9776
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94638
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94638
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1400829
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20180906 [SECURITY] [DLA 1497-1] qemu security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/09/msg00007.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 CVE request Qemu: net: mcf_fec: infinite loop while receiving data in mcf_fec_receive
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/3
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: CVE request Qemu: net: mcf_fec: infinite loop while receiving data in mcf_fec_receive
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/8
Reference: MLIST:[qemu-devel] 20161130 [PATCH] net: mcf: check receive buffer size register value
Reference: URL:https://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/qemu-devel/2016-11/msg05324.html

QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) built with the ColdFire Fast Ethernet
Controller emulator support is vulnerable to an infinite loop issue.
It could occur while receiving packets in 'mcf_fec_receive'. A
privileged user/process inside guest could use this issue to crash the
QEMU process on the host leading to DoS.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9777
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94640
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94640
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=81cdb259fb6d8c1c4ecfeea389ff5a73c07f5755
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/ChangeLog-4.8.12
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1400804
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/81cdb259fb6d8c1c4ecfeea389ff5a73c07f5755
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 CVE request: Kernel: kvm: out of bounds memory access via vcpu_id
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/02/2

KVM in the Linux kernel before 4.8.12, when I/O APIC is enabled, does
not properly restrict the VCPU index, which allows guest OS users to
gain host OS privileges or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds
array access and host OS crash) via a crafted interrupt request,
related to arch/x86/kvm/ioapic.c and arch/x86/kvm/ioapic.h.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9778
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:95388
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95388
Reference: CONFIRM:https://kb.isc.org/article/AA-01442/
Reference: CONFIRM:https://security.netapp.com/advisory/ntap-20180926-0005/
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201708-01
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201708-01
Reference: SECTRACK:1037582
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037582

An error in handling certain queries can cause an assertion failure
when a server is using the nxdomain-redirect feature to cover a zone
for which it is also providing authoritative service. A vulnerable
server could be intentionally stopped by an attacker if it was using a
configuration that met the criteria for the vulnerability and if the
attacker could cause it to accept a query that possessed the required
attributes. Please note: This vulnerability affects the "nxdomain-
redirect" feature, which is one of two methods of handling NXDOMAIN
redirection, and is only available in certain versions of BIND.
Redirection using zones of type "redirect" is not affected by this
vulnerability. Affects BIND 9.9.8-S1 -> 9.9.8-S3, 9.9.9-S1 ->
9.9.9-S6, 9.11.0-9.11.0-P1.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9793
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94655
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94655
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=b98b0bc8c431e3ceb4b26b0dfc8db509518fb290
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/ChangeLog-4.8.14
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1402013
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/b98b0bc8c431e3ceb4b26b0dfc8db509518fb290
Reference: CONFIRM:https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/2017-03-01.html
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/xairy/kernel-exploits/tree/master/CVE-2016-9793
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161202 Re: CVE Request: Linux: signed overflows for SO_{SND|RCV}BUFFORCE
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/03/1
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0931
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0931
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0932
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0932
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0933
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:0933
Reference: SECTRACK:1037968
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037968

The sock_setsockopt function in net/core/sock.c in the Linux kernel
before 4.8.14 mishandles negative values of sk_sndbuf and sk_rcvbuf,
which allows local users to cause a denial of service (memory
corruption and system crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact
by leveraging the CAP_NET_ADMIN capability for a crafted setsockopt
system call with the (1) SO_SNDBUFFORCE or (2) SO_RCVBUFFORCE option.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9794
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94654
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94654
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=3aa02cb664c5fb1042958c8d1aa8c35055a2ebc4
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1401494
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/3aa02cb664c5fb1042958c8d1aa8c35055a2ebc4
Reference: CONFIRM:https://patchwork.kernel.org/patch/8752621/
Reference: CONFIRM:https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/2017-05-01
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161203 CVE request: -- Linux kernel: ALSA: use-after-free in,kill_fasync
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/03/2
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2574
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2574.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3146
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00062.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3188
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00072.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3203
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00075.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3217
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00081.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3248
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00088.html
Reference: SUSE:SUSE-SU-2016:3252
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00091.html
Reference: SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2016:3118
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2016-12/msg00057.html

Race condition in the snd_pcm_period_elapsed function in
sound/core/pcm_lib.c in the ALSA subsystem in the Linux kernel before
4.7 allows local users to cause a denial of service (use-after-free)
or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted
SNDRV_PCM_TRIGGER_START command.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9795
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:95819
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95819
Reference: BUGTRAQ:20170126 CA20170126-01: Security Notice for CA Common Services casrvc
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/540062/100/0/threaded
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.ca.com/us/services-support/ca-support/ca-support-online/product-content/recommended-reading/security-notices/ca20170126-01--security-notice-for-ca-common-services-casrvc.html
Reference: SECTRACK:1037730
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037730

The casrvc program in CA Common Services, as used in CA Client
Automation 12.8, 12.9, and 14.0; CA SystemEDGE 5.8.2 and 5.9; CA
Systems Performance for Infrastructure Managers 12.8 and 12.9; CA
Universal Job Management Agent 11.2; CA Virtual Assurance for
Infrastructure Managers 12.8 and 12.9; CA Workload Automation AE 11,
11.3, 11.3.5, and 11.3.6 on AIX, HP-UX, Linux, and Solaris allows
local users to modify arbitrary files and consequently gain root
privileges via vectors related to insufficient validation.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9796
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161202)
Reference: BID:94649
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94649
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:40862
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/40862/
Reference: MISC:http://blog.malerisch.net/2016/12/alcatel-omnivista-8770-unauth-rce-giop-corba.html
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/malerisch/omnivista-8770-unauth-rce
Reference: MISC:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aq37lQKa9sk

Alcatel-Lucent OmniVista 8770 2.0 through 3.0 exposes different ORBs
interfaces, which can be queried using the GIOP protocol on TCP port
30024. An attacker can bypass authentication, and OmniVista invokes
methods (AddJobSet, AddJob, and ExecuteNow) that can be used to run
arbitrary commands on the server, with the privilege of NT
AUTHORITY\SYSTEM on the server. NOTE: The discoverer states "The
vendor position is to refer to the technical guidelines of the product
security deployment to mitigate this issue, which means applying
proper firewall rules to prevent unauthorised clients to connect to
the OmniVista server."


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9797
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161203)
Reference: BID:94652
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94652
Reference: MISC:https://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-bluetooth/msg68892.html
Reference: SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2019:1476
Reference: URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2019-05/msg00069.html

In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer over-read was observed in "l2cap_dump"
function in "tools/parser/l2cap.c" source file. This issue can be
triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in
hcidump crash.

None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9800
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161203)
Reference: BID:94652
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94652
Reference: MISC:https://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-bluetooth/msg68892.html

In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer overflow was observed in "pin_code_reply_dump"
function in "tools/parser/hci.c" source file. The issue exists because
"pin" array is overflowed by supplied parameter due to lack of
boundary checks on size of the buffer from frame "pin_code_reply_cp
*cp" parameter.

None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9803
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161203)
Reference: BID:94652
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94652
Reference: MISC:https://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-bluetooth/msg68892.html

In BlueZ 5.42, an out-of-bounds read was observed in "le_meta_ev_dump"
function in "tools/parser/hci.c" source file. This issue exists
because 'subevent' (which is used to read correct element from
'ev_le_meta_str' array) is overflowed.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9804
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161203)
Reference: BID:94652
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94652
Reference: MISC:https://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-bluetooth/msg68892.html

In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer overflow was observed in "commands_dump"
function in "tools/parser/csr.c" source file. The issue exists because
"commands" array is overflowed by supplied parameter due to lack of
boundary checks on size of the buffer from frame "frm->ptr" parameter.
This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and
will result in hcidump crash.

Name: CVE-2016-9806
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161204)
Reference: BID:94653
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94653
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=92964c79b357efd980812c4de5c1fd2ec8bb5520
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/ChangeLog-4.6.3
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1401502
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/92964c79b357efd980812c4de5c1fd2ec8bb5520
Reference: CONFIRM:https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/2017-03-01.html
Reference: MLIST:[netdev] 20160515 BUG: use-after-free in netlink_dump
Reference: URL:http://lists.openwall.net/netdev/2016/05/15/69
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161203 CVE Request: -- Linux kernel: double free in netlink_dump
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/03/4
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1842
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1842
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2077
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2077
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2669
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2669
Reference: SECTRACK:1037968
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037968

Race condition in the netlink_dump function in
net/netlink/af_netlink.c in the Linux kernel before 4.6.3 allows local
users to cause a denial of service (double free) or possibly have
unspecified other impact via a crafted application that makes sendmsg
system calls, leading to a free operation associated with a new dump
that started earlier than anticipated.

None (candidate not yet proposed)

cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors involving left shift of
a negative value.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9834
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: MISC:http://seclists.org/bugtraq/2017/Jun/4

An XSS vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary
client side script on vulnerable installations of Sophos Cyberoam
firewall devices with firmware through 10.6.4. User interaction is
required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a
malicious page or open a malicious file. The specific flaw exists
within the handling of a request to the "LiveConnectionDetail.jsp"
application. GET parameters "applicationname" and "username" are
improperly sanitized allowing an attacker to inject arbitrary
JavaScript into the page. This can be abused by an attacker to perform
a cross-site scripting attack on the user. A vulnerable URI is
/corporate/webpages/trafficdiscovery/LiveConnectionDetail.jsp.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9835
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:95005
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95005
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/zikula/core/blob/1.3/CHANGELOG-1.3.md
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/zikula/core/blob/1.4/CHANGELOG-1.4.md
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/zikula/core/issues/3237

Directory traversal vulnerability in file "jcss.php" in Zikula 1.3.x
before 1.3.11 and 1.4.x before 1.4.4 on Windows allows a remote
attacker to launch a PHP object injection by uploading a serialized
file.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9836
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:94663
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94663
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/XiphosResearch/exploits/tree/master/Joomraa

The file scanning mechanism of JFilterInput::isFileSafe() in Joomla!
CMS before 3.6.5 does not consider alternative PHP file extensions
when checking uploaded files for PHP content, which enables a user to
upload and execute files with the `.php6`, `.php7`, `.phtml`, and
`.phpt` extensions. Additionally, JHelperMedia::canUpload() did not
blacklist these file extensions as uploadable file types.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9837
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:94892
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94892
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.joomla.org/announcements/release-news/5693-joomla-3-6-5-released.html

An issue was discovered in
templates/beez3/html/com_content/article/default.php in Joomla! before
3.6.5. Inadequate permissions checks in the Beez3 layout override of
the com_content article view allow users to view articles that should
not be publicly accessible, as demonstrated by an
index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=1&template=beez3 request.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9838
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:94893
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94893
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.joomla.org/announcements/release-news/5693-joomla-3-6-5-released.html
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41157
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41157/

An issue was discovered in
components/com_users/models/registration.php in Joomla! before 3.6.5.
Incorrect filtering of registration form data stored to the session on
a validation error enables a user to gain access to a registered
user's account and reset the user's group mappings, username, and
password, as demonstrated by submitting a form that targets the
`registration.register` task.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors
involving left shifts of negative integers.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9844
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:94728
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94728
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/unzip/+bug/1643750
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 CVE Request: Info-Zip zipinfo buffer overflow
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/13
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 CVE Request: Info-Zip zipinfo buffer overflow
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/19
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 Re: CVE Request: Info-Zip zipinfo buffer overflow
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/20

Buffer overflow in the zi_short function in zipinfo.c in Info-Zip
UnZip 6.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash)
via a large compression method value in the central directory file
header.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9845
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:94763
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94763
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 CVE request: Qemu: display: virtio-gpu-3d: information leakage in virgl_cmd_get_capset_info
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/15
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 Re: CVE request: Qemu: display: virtio-gpu-3d: information leakage in virgl_cmd_get_capset_info
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/22
Reference: MLIST:[qemu-devel] 20161101 [PATCH] virtio-gpu: fix information leak in getting capset info dispatch
Reference: URL:https://lists.nongnu.org/archive/html/qemu-devel/2016-11/msg00019.html

QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) built with the Virtio GPU Device emulator
support is vulnerable to an information leakage issue. It could occur
while processing 'VIRTIO_GPU_CMD_GET_CAPSET_INFO' command. A guest
user/process could use this flaw to leak contents of the host memory
bytes.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9846
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161205)
Reference: BID:94765
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94765
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 CVE request Qemu: display: virtio-gpu: memory leakage while updating cursor
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/18
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161205 Re: CVE request Qemu: display: virtio-gpu: memory leakage while updating cursor
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/05/23
Reference: MLIST:[qemu-devel] 20161101 [PATCH] virtio-gpu: fix memory leak in update_cursor_data_virgl
Reference: URL:https://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/qemu-devel/2016-11/msg00029.html

QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) built with the Virtio GPU Device emulator
support is vulnerable to a memory leakage issue. It could occur while
updating the cursor data in update_cursor_data_virgl. A guest
user/process could use this flaw to leak host memory bytes, resulting
in DoS for a host.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9847
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:94524
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94524
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-58
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-32
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32

An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. When the user does not specify
a blowfish_secret key for encrypting cookies, phpMyAdmin generates one
at runtime. A vulnerability was reported where the way this value is
created uses a weak algorithm. This could allow an attacker to
determine the user's blowfish_secret and potentially decrypt their
cookies. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to
4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

(prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9849
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:94521
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94521
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-60

Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2019/06/msg00009.html

An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. It is possible to bypass
AllowRoot restriction ($cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowRoot']) and deny
rules for username by using Null Byte in the username. All 4.6.x
versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and
4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

Name: CVE-2016-9850

Reference: BID:94529

username in the rule due to non-constant execution time. All 4.6.x
versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and
4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9852
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:94527
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94527
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-63
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-32
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32

An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. By calling some scripts that
are part of phpMyAdmin in an unexpected way, it is possible to trigger
phpMyAdmin to display a PHP error message which contains the full path
of the directory where phpMyAdmin is installed. During an execution
timeout in the export functionality, the errors containing the full
path of the directory of phpMyAdmin are written to the export file.
All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), and 4.4.x versions (prior to
4.4.15.9) are affected. This CVE is for the curl wrapper issue.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Name: CVE-2016-9856

Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-32
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32

An XSS issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin because of an improper fix
for CVE-2016-2559 in PMASA-2016-10. This issue is resolved by using a
copy of a hash to avoid a race condition. All 4.6.x versions (prior to
4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior
to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

Reference: BID:94526

Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-68
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-32
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32

An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. With a very large request to
table partitioning function, it is possible to invoke a Denial of
Service (DoS) attack. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5) are
affected.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9864
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:94533
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94533
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-69
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-32
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20190617 [SECURITY] [DLA 1821-1] phpmyadmin security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2019/06/msg00009.html

An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. With a crafted username or a
table name, it was possible to inject SQL statements in the tracking
functionality that would run with the privileges of the control user.
This gives read and write access to the tables of the configuration
storage database, and if the control user has the necessary
privileges, read access to some tables of the MySQL database. All
4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9),
and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. Due to a bug in serialized
string parsing, it was possible to bypass the protection offered by
PMA_safeUnserialize() function. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5),
4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to
4.0.10.18) are affected.

An issue was discovered in EMC ScaleIO versions before 2.0.1.1. A low-
privileged local attacker may cause a denial-of-service by generating
a kernel panic in the SCINI driver using IOCTL calls which may render
the ScaleIO Data Client (SDC) server unavailable until the next
reboot.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9878
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:95072
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95072
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpuapr2018-3678067.html
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujan2018-3236628.html

Reference: CONFIRM:https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2016-9878
Reference: CONFIRM:https://security.netapp.com/advisory/ntap-20180419-0002/
Reference: MISC:https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20190713 [SECURITY] [DLA 1853-1] libspring-java security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2019/07/msg00012.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:3115
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:3115
Reference: SECTRACK:1040698
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1040698

An issue was discovered in Pivotal Spring Framework before 3.2.18,
4.2.x before 4.2.9, and 4.3.x before 4.3.5. Paths provided to the
ResourceServlet were not properly sanitized and as a result exposed to
directory traversal attacks.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9879
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:95142
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95142
Reference: CONFIRM:https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2016-9879
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:1832
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:1832

An issue was discovered in Pivotal Spring Security before 3.2.10,
4.1.x before 4.1.4, and 4.2.x before 4.2.1. Spring Security does not
consider URL path parameters when processing security constraints. By
adding a URL path parameter with an encoded "/" to a request, an
attacker may be able to bypass a security constraint. The root cause
of this issue is a lack of clarity regarding the handling of path
parameters in the Servlet Specification. Some Servlet containers
include path parameters in the value returned for getPathInfo() and
some do not. Spring Security uses the value returned by getPathInfo()
as part of the process of mapping requests to security constraints.
The unexpected presence of path parameters can cause a constraint to
be bypassed. Users of Apache Tomcat (all current versions) are not
affected by this vulnerability since Tomcat follows the guidance
previously provided by the Servlet Expert group and strips path
parameters from the value returned by getContextPath(),
getServletPath(), and getPathInfo(). Users of other Servlet containers
based on Apache Tomcat may or may not be affected depending on whether
or not the handling of path parameters has been modified. Users of IBM
WebSphere Application Server 8.5.x are known to be affected. Users of
other containers that implement the Servlet specification may be
affected.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9880
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:96146
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96146
Reference: CONFIRM:https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2016-9880

The GemFire broker for Cloud Foundry 1.6.x before 1.6.5 and 1.7.x
before 1.7.1 has multiple API endpoints which do not require
authentication and could be used to gain access to the cluster managed
by the broker.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9885
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161206)
Reference: BID:95270
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95270
Reference: CONFIRM:https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2016-9885

An issue was discovered in Pivotal GemFire for PCF 1.6.x versions
prior to 1.6.5 and 1.7.x versions prior to 1.7.1. The gfsh (Geode
Shell) endpoint, used by operators and application developers to
connect to their cluster, is unauthenticated and publicly accessible.
Because HTTPS communications are terminated at the gorouter,
communications from the gorouter to GemFire clusters are unencrypted.
An attacker could run any command available on gfsh and could cause
denial of service, lost confidentiality of data, escalate privileges,
or eavesdrop on other communications between the gorouter and the
cluster.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9892
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161207)
Reference: BID:96462
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96462
Reference: CONFIRM:http://support.eset.com/ca6333/
Reference: FULLDISC:20170227 CVE-2016-9892 - Remote Code Execution as Root via ESET Endpoint Antivirus 6
Reference: URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2017/Feb/68
Reference: MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/141350/ESET-Endpoint-Antivirus-6-Remote-Code-Execution.html

The esets_daemon service in ESET Endpoint Antivirus for macOS before
6.4.168.0 and Endpoint Security for macOS before 6.4.168.0 does not
properly verify X.509 certificates from the edf.eset.com SSL server,
which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof this server and
provide crafted responses to license activation requests via a self-
signed certificate.  NOTE: this issue can be combined with
CVE-2016-0718 to execute arbitrary code remotely as root.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9897

Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037461

WebGL functions using a vector constructor with a varying array within
libGLES. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 50.1, Firefox ESR <
45.6, and Thunderbird < 45.6.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9902
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161207)
Reference: BID:94885
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94885
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1320039
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.mozilla.org/security/advisories/mfsa2016-94/
Reference: CONFIRM:https://www.mozilla.org/security/advisories/mfsa2016-95/
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-15
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-15
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2946
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2946.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2016:2973
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2016-2973.html
Reference: SECTRACK:1037461
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037461

The Pocket toolbar button, once activated, listens for events fired
from it's own pages but does not verify the origin of incoming events.
This allows content from other origins to fire events and inject
content and commands into the Pocket context. Note: this issue does
not affect users with e10s enabled. This vulnerability affects Firefox
ESR < 45.6 and Firefox < 50.1.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Mozilla's add-ons SDK had a world-accessible resource with an HTML
injection vulnerability. If an additional vulnerability allowed this

and script into an add-on's context. This vulnerability affects

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9907
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161208)
Reference: BID:94759
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94759
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20180906 [SECURITY] [DLA 1497-1] qemu security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/09/msg00007.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161208 Re: CVE request Qemu: usb: redirector: memory leakage when destroying
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/08/3
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2392
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2392
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2408
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2408

Quick Emulator (Qemu) built with the USB redirector usb-guest support
is vulnerable to a memory leakage flaw. It could occur while
destroying the USB redirector in 'usbredir_handle_destroy'. A guest
user/process could use this issue to leak host memory, resulting in
DoS for a host.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9908
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161208)
Reference: BID:94761
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94761
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49

Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/08/4

Quick Emulator (Qemu) built with the Virtio GPU Device emulator
support is vulnerable to an information leakage issue. It could occur
while processing 'VIRTIO_GPU_CMD_GET_CAPSET' command. A guest
user/process could use this flaw to leak contents of the host memory
bytes.

attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks by leveraging
mishandling of the < (less than) character in attribute values.
