Name: CVE-2016-9913
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161208)
Reference: BID:94729
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94729
Reference: CONFIRM:http://git.qemu.org/?p=qemu.git;a=commit;h=4774718e5c194026ba5ee7a28d9be49be3080e42
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161207 CVE request Qemu: 9pfs: memory leakage via proxy/handle callbacks
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/06/11

Memory leak in the v9fs_device_unrealize_common function in
hw/9pfs/9p.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) allows local privileged
guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host memory consumption
and possibly QEMU process crash) via vectors involving the order of
resource cleanup.

Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161208 CVE request: Linux panic on fragemented IPv6 traffic (icmp6_send)
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/08/15

The icmp6_send function in net/ipv6/icmp.c in the Linux kernel through
4.8.12 omits a certain check of the dst data structure, which allows
remote attackers to cause a denial of service (panic) via a fragmented
IPv6 packet.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9920
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161208)
Reference: BID:94858
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94858
Reference: CONFIRM:https://roundcube.net/news/2016/11/28/updates-1.2.3-and-1.1.7-released
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201612-44
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201612-44
Reference: MISC:https://blog.ripstech.com/2016/roundcube-command-execution-via-email/
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161208 roundcube code execution via mail()
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/08/10

steps/mail/sendmail.inc in Roundcube before 1.1.7 and 1.2.x before
1.2.3, when no SMTP server is configured and the sendmail program is
enabled, does not properly restrict the use of custom envelope-from
addresses on the sendmail command line, which allows remote
authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a modified HTTP
request that sends a crafted e-mail message.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9921
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161208)
Reference: BID:94803
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94803
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-49
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-49
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20180906 [SECURITY] [DLA 1497-1] qemu security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/09/msg00007.html
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161209 Re: CVE request Qemu: display: cirrus_vga: a divide by zero in cirrus_do_copy
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/09/1
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2392
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2392
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:2408
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:2408

Quick emulator (Qemu) built with the Cirrus CLGD 54xx VGA Emulator
support is vulnerable to a divide by zero issue. It could occur while
copying VGA data when cirrus graphics mode was set to be VGA. A
privileged user inside guest could use this flaw to crash the Qemu
process instance on the host, resulting in DoS.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9936

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9937
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161212)
Reference: BID:94792
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94792
Reference: CONFIRM:http://downloads.asterisk.org/pub/security/AST-2016-008-13.diff
Reference: CONFIRM:http://downloads.asterisk.org/pub/security/AST-2016-008-14.diff
Reference: CONFIRM:http://downloads.asterisk.org/pub/security/AST-2016-008.html
Reference: CONFIRM:https://issues.asterisk.org/jira/browse/ASTERISK-26579
Reference: SECTRACK:1037407
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037407

An issue was discovered in Asterisk Open Source 13.12.x and 13.13.x
before 13.13.1 and 14.x before 14.2.1. If an SDP offer or answer is
received with the Opus codec and with the format parameters separated
using a space the code responsible for parsing will recursively call
itself until it crashes. This occurs as the code does not properly
handle spaces separating the parameters. This does NOT require the
endpoint to have Opus configured in Asterisk. This also does not
require the endpoint to be authenticated. If guest is enabled for
chan_sip or anonymous in chan_pjsip an SDP offer or answer is still
processed and the crash occurs.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9938
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161212)
Reference: BID:94789
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94789
Reference: CONFIRM:http://downloads.asterisk.org/pub/security/AST-2016-009.html
Reference: SECTRACK:1037408
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037408

An issue was discovered in Asterisk Open Source 11.x before 11.25.1,
13.x before 13.13.1, and 14.x before 14.2.1 and Certified Asterisk
11.x before 11.6-cert16 and 13.x before 13.8-cert4. The chan_sip
channel driver has a liberal definition for whitespace when attempting
to strip the content between a SIP header name and a colon character.
Rather than following RFC 3261 and stripping only spaces and
horizontal tabs, Asterisk treats any non-printable ASCII character as
if it were whitespace. This means that headers such as Contact\x01:
will be seen as a valid Contact header. This mostly does not pose a
problem until Asterisk is placed in tandem with an authenticating SIP
proxy. In such a case, a crafty combination of valid and invalid To
headers can cause a proxy to allow an INVITE request into Asterisk
without authentication since it believes the request is an in-dialog
request. However, because of the bug described above, the request will
look like an out-of-dialog request to Asterisk. Asterisk will then
process the request as a new call. The result is that Asterisk can
process calls from unvetted sources without any authentication. If you
do not use a proxy for authentication, then this issue does not affect
you. If your proxy is dialog-aware (meaning that the proxy keeps track
of what dialogs are currently valid), then this issue does not affect
you. If you use chan_pjsip instead of chan_sip, then this issue does
not affect you.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9939
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161212)
Reference: BID:94854
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94854
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3748
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3748
Reference: FEDORA:FEDORA-2019-812b77ed2e
Reference: URL:https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/7IL5A6465IEPW5GAWGXB2ENJPFYVWTJM/
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161212 Re: CVE Request: Potential DoS in Crypto++ ASN.1 parser
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/12/7

Crypto++ (aka cryptopp and libcrypto++) 5.6.4 contained a bug in its
ASN.1 BER decoding routine. The library will allocate a memory block
based on the length field of the ASN.1 object. If there is not enough
content octets in the ASN.1 object, then the function will fail and
the memory block will be zeroed even if its unused. There is a
noticeable delay during the wipe for a large allocation.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9941
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161213)
Reference: BID:95170
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95170
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/LibVNC/libvncserver/pull/137
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/LibVNC/libvncserver/releases/tag/LibVNCServer-0.9.11
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3753
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2017/dsa-3753
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201702-24

LibVNCServer before 0.9.11 allows remote servers to cause a denial of
service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a
crafted FramebufferUpdate message containing a subrectangle outside of
the client drawing area.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9942
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161213)
Reference: BID:95170
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95170
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/LibVNC/libvncserver/pull/137
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/LibVNC/libvncserver/releases/tag/LibVNCServer-0.9.11
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-3753
Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2017/dsa-3753
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201702-24
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201702-24
Reference: MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20191030 [SECURITY] [DLA 1979-1] italc security update
Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2019/10/msg00042.html
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-4587-1
Reference: URL:https://usn.ubuntu.com/4587-1/

Heap-based buffer overflow in ultra.c in LibVNCClient in LibVNCServer
before 0.9.11 allows remote servers to cause a denial of service
(application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted
FramebufferUpdate message with the Ultra type tile, such that the LZO
payload decompressed length exceeds what is specified by the tile
dimensions.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9948
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161213)

** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or
individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem.
When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate
will be provided.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9949
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161214)
Reference: BID:95011
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95011
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:40937
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/40937/
Reference: MISC:https://bugs.launchpad.net/apport/+bug/1648806
Reference: MISC:https://donncha.is/2016/12/compromising-ubuntu-desktop/
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/DonnchaC/ubuntu-apport-exploitation
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3157-1
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3157-1

An issue was discovered in Apport before 2.20.4. In apport/ui.py,
Apport reads the CrashDB field and it then evaluates the field as
Python code if it begins with a "{". This allows remote attackers to
execute arbitrary Python code.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9950
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161214)
Reference: BID:95011
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95011
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:40937
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/40937/
Reference: MISC:https://bugs.launchpad.net/apport/+bug/1648806
Reference: MISC:https://donncha.is/2016/12/compromising-ubuntu-desktop/
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/DonnchaC/ubuntu-apport-exploitation
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3157-1
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3157-1

An issue was discovered in Apport before 2.20.4. There is a path
traversal issue in the Apport crash file "Package" and "SourcePackage"
fields. These fields are used to build a path to the package specific
hook files in the /usr/share/apport/package-hooks/ directory. An
attacker can exploit this path traversal to execute arbitrary Python
files from the local system.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9951
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161214)
Reference: BID:95011
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95011
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:40937
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/40937/
Reference: MISC:https://bugs.launchpad.net/apport/+bug/1648806
Reference: MISC:https://donncha.is/2016/12/compromising-ubuntu-desktop/
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/DonnchaC/ubuntu-apport-exploitation
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3157-1
Reference: URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-3157-1

An issue was discovered in Apport before 2.20.4. A malicious Apport
crash file can contain a restart command in `RespawnCommand` or
`ProcCmdline` fields. This command will be executed if a user clicks
the Relaunch button on the Apport prompt from the malicious crash
file. The fix is to only show the Relaunch button on Apport crash
files generated by local systems. The Relaunch button will be hidden
when crash files are opened directly in Apport-GTK.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9952
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161215)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://curl.haxx.se/CVE-2016-9952.patch
Reference: CONFIRM:https://curl.haxx.se/docs/adv_20161221B.html

The verify_certificate function in lib/vtls/schannel.c in libcurl
7.30.0 through 7.51.0, when built for Windows CE using the schannel
TLS backend, makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct man-in-
the-middle attacks via a crafted wildcard SAN in a server certificate,
as demonstrated by "*.com."


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9953
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161215)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://curl.haxx.se/CVE-2016-9952.patch
Reference: CONFIRM:https://curl.haxx.se/docs/adv_20161221C.html

The verify_certificate function in lib/vtls/schannel.c in libcurl
7.30.0 through 7.51.0, when built for Windows CE using the schannel
TLS backend, allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information,
cause a denial of service (crash), or possibly have unspecified other
impact via a wildcard certificate name, which triggers an out-of-
bounds read.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9954
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161215)
Reference: BID:94942
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94942
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1413990
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/ashinn/irregex/commit/a16ffc86eca15fca9e40607d41de3cea9cf868f1
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20161215 Re: CVE Request: IrRegular Expressions resource exhaustion in regex compilation [was: Re: CVE Request: resource exhaustion in regex expression handling in WebKit]
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/12/15/8

The backtrack compilation code in the Irregex package (aka IrRegular
Expressions) before 0.9.6 for Scheme allows remote attackers to cause
a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted regular
expression with a repeating pattern.

None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================

The SimpleSAML_XML_Validator class constructor in SimpleSAMLphp before
1.14.11 might allow remote attackers to spoof signatures on SAML 1
responses or possibly cause a denial of service (memory consumption)
by leveraging improper conversion of return values to boolean.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9962
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161215)
Reference: BID:95361
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95361
Reference: BUGTRAQ:20170111 Re: [oss-security] Docker 1.12.6 - Security Advisory
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/540001/100/0/threaded
Reference: CONFIRM:https://access.redhat.com/security/vulnerabilities/cve-2016-9962
Reference: CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1012568#c6
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/docker/docker/releases/tag/v1.12.6
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/commit/50a19c6ff828c58e5dab13830bd3dacde268afe5
Reference: FEDORA:FEDORA-2017-0200646669
Reference: URL:https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/UVM7FCOQMPKOFLDTUYSS4ES76DDM56VP/
Reference: FEDORA:FEDORA-2017-c2c2d1be16
Reference: URL:https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/FINGBFMIXBG6B6ZWYH3TMRP5V3PDBNXR/
Reference: FEDORA:FEDORA-2017-dbc2b618eb
Reference: URL:https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/BQAXJMMLRU7DD2IMG47SR2K4BOFFG7FZ/
Reference: FEDORA:FEDORA-2017-fcd02e2c2d
Reference: URL:https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/WUQ3MQNEL5IBZZLMLR72Q4YDCL2SCKRK/
Reference: FULLDISC:20170110 Docker 1.12.6 - Security Advisory
Reference: URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2017/Jan/21
Reference: FULLDISC:20170111 Re: [oss-security] Docker 1.12.6 - Security Advisory
Reference: URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2017/Jan/29
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201701-34
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-34
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0116
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0116.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0123
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0123.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:0127
Reference: URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017-0127.html

RunC allowed additional container processes via 'runc exec' to be
ptraced by the pid 1 of the container.  This allows the main processes
of the container, if running as root, to gain access to file-
descriptors of these new processes during the initialization and can
lead to container escapes or modification of runC state before the
process is fully placed inside the container.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2016-9964
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161216)
Reference: BID:94961
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94961
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/bottlepy/bottle/commit/6d7e13da0f998820800ecb3fe9ccee4189aefb54

Reference: URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2016/dsa-3743

redirect() in bottle.py in bottle 0.12.10 doesn't filter a "\r\n"
sequence, which leads to a CRLF attack, as demonstrated by a
redirect("233\r\nSet-Cookie: name=salt") call.

Reference: BID:94955

Reference: CONFIRM:http://security.samsungmobile.com/smrupdate.html#SMR-DEC-2016

Lack of appropriate exception handling in some receivers of the
Telecom application on Samsung Note devices with L(5.0/5.1), M(6.0),
and N(7.0) software allows attackers to crash the system easily
resulting in a possible DoS attack, or possibly gain privileges. The
Samsung ID is SVE-2016-7121.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0001
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96057
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96057
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0001
Reference: SECTRACK:1038002
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038002

The Graphics Device Interface (GDI) in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2;
Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1;
Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; and Windows 10 Gold,
1511, and 1607 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted
application, aka "Windows GDI Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
This vulnerability is different from those described in CVE-2017-0005,
CVE-2017-0025, and CVE-2017-0047.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0009
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96077
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96077

Microsoft Internet Explorer 9 through 11 allow remote attackers to
obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted web
site, aka "Microsoft Browser Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This
vulnerability is different from those described in CVE-2017-0011,
CVE-2017-0017, CVE-2017-0065, and CVE-2017-0068.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0010
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96059
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96059
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0010
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035, CVE-2017-0067,
CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094, CVE-2017-0131,
CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134, CVE-2017-0136,
CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141, CVE-2017-0150, and
CVE-2017-0151.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0011
Status: Candidate

Microsoft Edge allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information
via a crafted web site, aka "Microsoft Edge Information Disclosure
Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0009, CVE-2017-0017, CVE-2017-0065, and CVE-2017-0068.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0014
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96013
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96013
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0014
Reference: MISC:https://secuniaresearch.flexerasoftware.com/secunia_research/2017-9/
Reference: SECTRACK:1038002
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038002

The Windows Graphics Component in Microsoft Office 2010 SP2; Windows
Server 2008 R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012
Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and
Windows Server 2016 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code
via a crafted web site, aka "Windows Graphics Component Remote Code
Execution Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from that
described in CVE-2017-0108.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0015
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96079
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96079
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0015
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035, CVE-2017-0067,
CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094, CVE-2017-0131,
CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134, CVE-2017-0136,
CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141, CVE-2017-0150, and
CVE-2017-0151.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0016
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:95969
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95969
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0016
Reference: SECTRACK:1037767
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037767
Reference: SECTRACK:1038001
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038001

Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; Windows 8.1; Windows RT
8.1; Windows Server 2012 R2, and Windows Server 2016 do not properly
handle certain requests in SMBv2 and SMBv3 packets, which allows
remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SMBv2 or
SMBv3 packet to the Server service, aka "SMBv2/SMBv3 Null Dereference
Denial of Service Vulnerability."


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Name: CVE-2017-0028
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/Microsoft/ChakraCore/commit/402f3d967c0a905ec5b9ca9c240783d3f2c15724

A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft scripting
engine improperly accesses objects in memory. The vulnerability could
corrupt memory in a way that enables an attacker to execute arbitrary
code in the context of the current user. An attacker who successfully
exploited the vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the
current user, aka "Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0032
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96080
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96080
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0032
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0035, CVE-2017-0067,
CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094, CVE-2017-0131,
CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134, CVE-2017-0136,
CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141, CVE-2017-0150, and
CVE-2017-0151.

Name: CVE-2017-0037
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96088
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96088
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0037
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41454
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41454/
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:42354
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/42354/
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:43125
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/43125/
Reference: MISC:https://0patch.blogspot.si/2017/03/0patching-another-0-day-internet.html
Reference: MISC:https://bugs.chromium.org/p/project-zero/issues/detail?id=1011
Reference: SECTRACK:1037905
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037905
Reference: SECTRACK:1037906
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037906

Microsoft Internet Explorer 10 and 11 and Microsoft Edge have a type
confusion issue in the Layout::MultiColumnBoxBuilder::HandleColumnBrea
kOnColumnSpanningElement function in mshtml.dll, which allows remote
attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors involving a crafted
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequence and crafted JavaScript
code that operates on a TH element.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0038
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96023
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96023
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0038
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41363
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41363/
Reference: MISC:https://0patch.blogspot.com/2017/02/0patching-0-day-windows-gdi32dll-memory.html
Reference: MISC:https://bugs.chromium.org/p/project-zero/issues/detail?id=992
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/k0keoyo/CVE-2017-0038-EXP-C-JS
Reference: SECTRACK:1037845
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037845

gdi32.dll in Graphics Device Interface (GDI) in Microsoft Windows
Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows
8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, and Windows 10
Gold, 1511, and 1607 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive
information from process heap memory via a crafted EMF file, as
demonstrated by an EMR_SETDIBITSTODEVICE record with modified Device
Independent Bitmap (DIB) dimensions. NOTE: this vulnerability exists
because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-3216, CVE-2016-3219, and/or
CVE-2016-3220.

None (candidate not yet proposed)

Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96655

Current Votes:

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0067
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96662
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96662
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0067
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035,
CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094, CVE-2017-0131,
CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134, CVE-2017-0136,
CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141, CVE-2017-0150, and
CVE-2017-0151.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96637
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96637
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0073
Reference: SECTRACK:1038002
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038002

The Graphics Device Interface (GDI) in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2;
Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1;
Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; and Windows 10 Gold,
1511, and 1607 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information
from process memory via a crafted web site, aka "Windows GDI+
Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different
from those described in CVE-2017-0060 and CVE-2017-0062.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================

Windows 10, 1511, and 1607; and Windows Server 2016 allows guest OS

This vulnerability is different from those described in CVE-2017-0098,
CVE-2017-0076, CVE-2017-0097, and CVE-2017-0099.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0093
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:97419
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97419
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0093
Reference: SECTRACK:1038234
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038234

A remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Edge exists in the
way that the Scripting Engine renders when handling objects in memory
in Microsoft browsers. The vulnerability could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user, aka "Scripting Engine Memory Corruption
Vulnerability." This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2017-0201.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0094
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96682
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96682
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0094
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035,
CVE-2017-0067, CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094,
CVE-2017-0131, CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134,
CVE-2017-0136, CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141,
CVE-2017-0150, and CVE-2017-0151.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================

Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96699
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96699
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0095
Reference: SECTRACK:1037999
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037999

Hyper-V in Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607 and Windows
Server 2016 does not properly validate vSMB packet data, which allows
attackers to execute arbitrary code on a target OS, aka "Hyper-V vSMB
Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different
from that described in CVE-2017-0021.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0100
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96700
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96700
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0100
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41607
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41607/
Reference: MISC:http://blog.inspired-sec.com/archive/2017/03/17/COM-Moniker-Privesc.html
Reference: MISC:https://bugs.chromium.org/p/project-zero/issues/detail?id=1021
Reference: SECTRACK:1038001
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038001

A DCOM object in Helppane.exe in Microsoft Windows 7 SP1; Windows
Server 2008 R2; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows
RT 8.1; Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and Windows Server 2016
allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka
"Windows HelpPane Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."


Current Votes:

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0102
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96627
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96627

Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038013

Microsoft Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2; Windows 7
SP1; Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1;
Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and Windows Server 2016 let attackers
with access to targets systems gain privileges when Windows fails to
properly validate buffer lengths, aka "Windows Elevation of Privilege
Vulnerability."

and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, and Windows Server 2012 mishandles registry
objects in memory, which allows local users to gain privileges via a
crafted application, aka "Windows Registry Elevation of Privilege
Vulnerability."

and Word Viewer; Skype for Business 2016; Lync 2013 SP1; Lync 2010;

from that described in CVE-2017-0014.

information from process memory via a crafted web site, aka "Uniscribe
Information Disclosure Vulnerability." CVE-2017-0085, CVE-2017-0091,

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0130
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96647
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96647
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0130
Reference: SECTRACK:1038008
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038008

The scripting engine in Microsoft Internet Explorer 9 through 11
allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of
service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Scripting
Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This vulnerability is
different from that described in CVE-2017-0040.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0131
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96671
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96671
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0131
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035,
CVE-2017-0067, CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094,
CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134, CVE-2017-0136,
CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141, CVE-2017-0150, and
CVE-2017-0151.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0143
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96703
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96703
Reference: CONFIRM:https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-701903.pdf
Reference: CONFIRM:https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-966341.pdf
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0143
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41891
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41891/
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41987
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41987/
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:43970
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/43970/
Reference: MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/154690/DOUBLEPULSAR-Payload-Execution-Neutralization.html
Reference: MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/156196/SMB-DOUBLEPULSAR-Remote-Code-Execution.html
Reference: MISC:https://ics-cert.us-cert.gov/advisories/ICSMA-18-058-02
Reference: SECTRACK:1037991
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037991

The SMBv1 server in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008
SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold
and R2; Windows RT 8.1; and Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and
Windows Server 2016 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code
via crafted packets, aka "Windows SMB Remote Code Execution
Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0144, CVE-2017-0145, CVE-2017-0146, and CVE-2017-0148.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Reference: MISC:https://ics-cert.us-cert.gov/advisories/ICSMA-18-058-02
Reference: SECTRACK:1037991
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1037991

The SMBv1 server in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008
SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold
and R2; Windows RT 8.1; and Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and
Windows Server 2016 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code
via crafted packets, aka "Windows SMB Remote Code Execution
Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0143, CVE-2017-0144, CVE-2017-0146, and CVE-2017-0148.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0149
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96724
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96724
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0149

Microsoft Internet Explorer 9 through 11 allow remote attackers to
execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory
corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Internet Explorer Memory

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0150
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:96725
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96725
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0150
Reference: SECTRACK:1038006
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038006

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engines render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such
a way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user. If
the current user is logged on with administrative user rights, an
attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could take
control of an affected system. An attacker could then install
programs; view, change, or delete data; or create new accounts with
full user rights. This vulnerability is different from those described
in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035,
CVE-2017-0067, CVE-2017-0070, CVE-2017-0071, CVE-2017-0094,
CVE-2017-0131, CVE-2017-0132, CVE-2017-0133, CVE-2017-0134,
CVE-2017-0136, CVE-2017-0137, CVE-2017-0138, CVE-2017-0141, and
CVE-2017-0151.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected

Microsoft browsers. These vulnerabilities could corrupt memory in such

in CVE-2017-0010, CVE-2017-0015, CVE-2017-0032, CVE-2017-0035,

Name: CVE-2017-0152
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/Microsoft/ChakraCore/commit/9da019424601325a6e95e6be0fa03d7d21d0b517

A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way affected
Microsoft scripting engine render when handling objects in memory in
Microsoft browsers. The vulnerability could corrupt memory in such a
way that an attacker could execute arbitrary code in the context of
the current user. An attacker who successfully exploited the
vulnerability could gain the same user rights as the current user, aka
"Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

Name: CVE-2017-0176
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: BID:98550
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/98550
Reference: BID:98752
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/98752
Reference: CONFIRM:https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/4022747/security-update-for-windows-xp-and-windows-server-2003
Reference: MISC:https://blog.0patch.com/2017/06/a-quick-analysis-of-microsofts.html
Reference: MISC:https://blog.fortinet.com/2017/05/11/deep-analysis-of-esteemaudit
Reference: MISC:https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/msrc/2017/04/14/protecting-customers-and-evaluating-risk/

A buffer overflow in Smart Card authentication code in gpkcsp.dll in
Microsoft Windows XP through SP3 and Server 2003 through SP2 allows a
remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target computer,
provided that the computer is joined in a Windows domain and has
Remote Desktop Protocol connectivity (or Terminal Services) enabled.

Phase: Assigned(20160909)

Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97416
Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0178

A denial of service vulnerability exists when Microsoft Hyper-V
running on Windows 10, Windows 10 1511, Windows 10 1607, Windows 8.1,
Windows Server 2012 R2, and Windows Server 2016 host server fails to
properly validate input from a privileged user on a guest operating
system, aka "Hyper-V Denial of Service Vulnerability." This CVE ID is
unique from CVE-2017-0179, CVE-2017-0182, CVE-2017-0183,
CVE-2017-0184, CVE-2017-0185, and CVE-2017-0186.

Reference: CONFIRM:https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0212

Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server
2016 fail to properly validate vSMB packet data, aka "Windows Hyper-V
vSMB Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0247
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20160909)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/security/4021279.aspx
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/aspnet/Announcements/issues/239
Reference: MISC:https://www.sidertia.com/Home/Community/Blog/2017/05/18/ASPNET-Core-Unicode-Non-Char-Encoding-DoS

A denial of service vulnerability exists when the ASP.NET Core fails
to properly validate web requests. NOTE: Microsoft has not commented
on third-party claims that the issue is that the
TextEncoder.EncodeCore function in the System.Text.Encodings.Web
package in ASP.NET Core Mvc before 1.0.4 and 1.1.x before 1.1.3 allows
remote attackers to cause a denial of service by leveraging failure to
properly calculate the length of 4-byte characters in the Unicode Non-
Character range.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

4.7 allow an attacker to bypass Enhanced Security Usage taggings when
they present a certificate that is invalid for a specific use, aka

Silverlight 5 when installed on Microsoft Windows allows a remote code
execution vulnerability due to the way it handles objects in memory,
aka "Windows Uniscribe Remote Code Execution Vulnerability". This CVE
ID is unique from CVE-2017-8528.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

the application resources and backend servers are unaffected.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0303
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161109)
Reference: BID:101612
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/101612
Reference: CONFIRM:https://support.f5.com/csp/article/K30201296
Reference: SECTRACK:1039674
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1039674

In F5 BIG-IP LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, GTM, Link
Controller, PEM and Websafe software version 13.0.0, 12.0.0 to 12.1.2
and 11.5.1 to 11.6.1, under limited circumstances connections handled
by a Virtual Server with an associated SOCKS profile may not be
properly cleaned up, potentially leading to resource starvation.
Connections may be left in the connection table which then can only be
removed by restarting TMM. Over time this may lead to the BIG-IP being
unable to process further connections.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

on versions 12.0.0, 12.1.0, 12.1.1, 12.1.2 and 13.0.0 that may allow a
copy of the firewall rules to be tampered with and impact the
Configuration Utility until there is a resync of the rules. Traffic
processing and the live firewall rules in use are not affected.

Phase: Assigned(20161123)

All versions of NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contain a
vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for
DxgkDdiEscape where untrusted input is used for buffer size
calculation leading to denial of service or escalation of privileges.

cause improper memory allocation leading to a denial of service or
potential escalation of privileges.

======================================================

vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for
DxgkDdiEscapeID 0x100008b where user provided input is used as the
limit for a loop may lead to denial of service or potential escalation

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0313
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161123)
Reference: CONFIRM:http://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4398
Reference: EXPLOIT-DB:41365
Reference: URL:https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/41365/

All versions of NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contain a
vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) implementation
of the SubmitCommandVirtual DDI (DxgkDdiSubmitCommandVirtual) where
untrusted input is used to reference memory outside of the intended
boundary of the buffer leading to denial of service or escalation of
privileges.

Reference: CONFIRM:http://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4560

In GeForce Experience (GFE) 3.x before 3.10.0.55, NVIDIA Installer
Framework contains a vulnerability in NVISystemService64 where a value
passed from a user to the driver is used without validation, which may
lead to denial of service or possible escalation of privileges.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Reference: CONFIRM:http://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4398

vulnerability where it fails to set proper permissions on the package
extraction path thus allowing a non-privileged user to tamper with the
extracted files, potentially leading to escalation of privileges via
code execution.

Reference: URL:https://marc.info/?l=oss-security&m=148594671929354&w=2
Reference: MLIST:[oss-security] 20170203 Re: CVE-2017-0358 ntfs-3g: modprobe influence vulnerability via environment variables
Reference: URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2017/02/04/1

Jann Horn of Google Project Zero discovered that NTFS-3G, a read-write
NTFS driver for FUSE, does not scrub the environment before executing
modprobe with elevated privileges. A local user can take advantage of
this flaw for local root privilege escalation.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0377
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161129)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://blog.torproject.org/blog/tor-0309-released-security-update-clients
Reference: CONFIRM:https://blog.torproject.org/blog/tor-0314-alpha-released-security-update-clients

Reference: CONFIRM:https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/22753

Tor 0.3.x before 0.3.0.9 has a guard-selection algorithm that only
considers the exit relay (not the exit relay's family), which might
allow remote attackers to defeat intended anonymity properties by
leveraging the existence of large families.

secret key, related to cipher/ecc.c and mpi/ec.c.

======================================================

Reference: SECTRACK:1039519
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1039519

The rend_service_intro_established function in or/rendservice.c in Tor
before 0.2.8.15, 0.2.9.x before 0.2.9.12, 0.3.0.x before 0.3.0.11,
0.3.1.x before 0.3.1.7, and 0.3.2.x before 0.3.2.1-alpha, when
SafeLogging is disabled, allows attackers to obtain sensitive
information by leveraging access to the log files of a hidden service,
because uninitialized stack data is included in an error message about
construction of an introduction point circuit.

Versions: Kernel-3.10, Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-31695439.
References: QC-CR#1086123, QC-CR#1100695.

that would normally require either user initiation or user permission.
Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID:
A-33178389.

Reference: CONFIRM:https://android.googlesource.com/platform/external/libhevc/+/bcfc7124f6ef9f1ec128fb2e90de774a5b33d199
Reference: CONFIRM:https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/2017-05-01

A remote code execution vulnerability in libhevc in Mediaserver could
enable an attacker using a specially crafted file to cause memory
corruption during media file and data processing. This issue is rated
as Critical due to the possibility of remote code execution within the
context of the Mediaserver process. Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2,
5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-34897036.

permission. Product: Android. Versions: Kernel-3.10, Kernel-3.18.
Android ID: A-35393124. References: QC-CR#1088050.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0855
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161129)
Reference: BID:102414
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/102414
Reference: CONFIRM:https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/2018-01-01
Reference: SECTRACK:1040106
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1040106

In MPEG4Extractor.cpp, there are several places where functions return
early without cleaning up internal buffers which could lead to memory
leaks. This could lead to remote denial of service of a critical
system process with no additional execution privileges needed. User
interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android.
Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID:
A-64452857.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0881
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:97159
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97159

before 1.4.3 allowed an authenticated user to subscribe to a private

to join. The issue affects all previously released versions of the
Zulip server.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0882
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:97157
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97157
Reference: MISC:https://about.gitlab.com/2017/03/20/gitlab-8-dot-17-dot-4-security-release/

Multiple versions of GitLab expose sensitive user credentials when

versions 8.15.8, 8.16.7, and 8.17.4, which were released on March 20th
2017 at 23:59 UTC.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0883
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://nextcloud.com/security/advisory/?id=nc-sa-2017-001
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/169680

Nextcloud Server before 9.0.55 and 10.0.2 suffers from a permission
increase on re-sharing via OCS API issue. A permission related issue
within the OCS sharing API allowed an authenticated adversary to
reshare shared files with an increasing permission set. This may allow
an attacker to edit files in a share despite having only a 'read'
permission set. Note that this only affects folders and files that the
adversary has at least read-only permissions for.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0884
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://nextcloud.com/security/advisory/?id=nc-sa-2017-002
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/169680

Nextcloud Server before 9.0.55 and 10.0.2 suffers from a creation of
folders in read-only folders despite lacking permissions issue. Due to
a logical error in the file caching layer an authenticated adversary
is able to create empty folders inside a shared folder. Note that this
only affects folders and files that the adversary has at least read-
only permissions for.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0885
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://nextcloud.com/security/advisory/?id=nc-sa-2017-003
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/174524

Nextcloud Server before 9.0.55 and 10.0.2 suffers from a error message
disclosing existence of file in write-only share. Due to an error in
the application logic an adversary with access to a write-only share
may enumerate the names of existing files and subfolders by comparing
the exception messages.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0886
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)

Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/174524

Nextcloud Server before 9.0.55 and 10.0.2 suffers from a Denial of
Service attack. Due to an error in the application logic an
authenticated adversary may trigger an endless recursion in the
application leading to a potential Denial of Service.


Current Votes:

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0887
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://nextcloud.com/security/advisory/?id=nc-sa-2017-005
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/173622

Nextcloud Server before 9.0.55 and 10.0.2 suffers from a bypass in the
quota limitation. Due to not properly sanitizing values provided by
the `OC-Total-Length` HTTP header an authenticated adversary may be
able to exceed their configured user quota. Thus using more space than
allowed by the administrator.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0897
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:99242
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/99242
Reference: CONFIRM:https://docs.expressionengine.com/latest/about/changelog.html#version-3-5-5
Reference: CONFIRM:https://docs.expressionengine.com/v2/about/changelog.html#version-2-11-8

Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/215890

ExpressionEngine version 2.x < 2.11.8 and version 3.x < 3.5.5 create
an object signing token with weak entropy. Successfully guessing the
token can lead to remote code execution.

Name: CVE-2017-0898
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: BID:100862
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/100862
Reference: DEBIAN:DSA-4031
Reference: URL:https://www.debian.org/security/2017/dsa-4031
Reference: GENTOO:GLSA-201710-18
Reference: URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201710-18
Reference: MISC:https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3722

Reference: MISC:https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/news/2017/09/14/sprintf-buffer-underrun-cve-2017-0898/

Reference: URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/07/msg00012.html
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2017:3485
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2017:3485
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2018:0378
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2018:0378
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2018:0583
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2018:0583
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2018:0585
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2018:0585

Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1039363
Reference: UBUNTU:USN-3685-1
Reference: URL:https://usn.ubuntu.com/3685-1/

Ruby before 2.4.2, 2.3.5, and 2.2.8 is vulnerable to a malicious
format string which contains a precious specifier (*) with a huge
minus value. Such situation can lead to a buffer overrun, resulting in
a heap memory corruption or an information disclosure from the heap.

Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2018:0583
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2018:0583
Reference: REDHAT:RHSA-2018:0585
Reference: URL:https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2018:0585
Reference: SECTRACK:1039249
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1039249

RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier is vulnerable to maliciously
crafted gem specifications that include terminal escape characters.
Printing the gem specification would execute terminal escape
sequences.

RubyGems versions between 2.0.0 and 2.6.13 are vulnerable to a
possible remote code execution vulnerability. YAML deserialization of
gem specifications can bypass class white lists. Specially crafted
serialized objects can possibly be used to escalate to remote code
execution.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0904
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/jtdowney/private_address_check/commit/58a0d7fe31de339c0117160567a5b33ad82b46af
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/jtdowney/private_address_check/issues/1
Reference: MISC:https://edoverflow.com/2017/ruby-resolv-bug/
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/287245
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/287835

The private_address_check ruby gem before 0.4.0 is vulnerable to a
bypass due to use of Ruby's Resolv.getaddresses method, which is OS-
dependent and should not be relied upon for security measures, such as
when used to blacklist private network addresses to prevent server-
side request forgery.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0910
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:http://blog.zulip.org/2017/11/23/zulip-1-7-1-released/
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/zulip/zulip/commit/960d736e55cbb9386a68e4ee45f80581fd2a4e32

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0911
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://blog.twitter.com/developer/en_us/topics/tips/2018/vulnerability-in-twitter-kit-for-ios.html
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/twitter/twitter-kit-ios/blob/b6eb49d149b056d826cbc4b53eaeb39a3ebd591e/TwitterKit/TwitterKit/Social/Identity/TWTRMobileSSO.m#L71
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/twitter/twitter-kit-ios/blob/b6eb49d149b056d826cbc4b53eaeb39a3ebd591e/TwitterKit/TwitterKit/TWTRTwitter.m#L411
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/twitter/twitter-kit-ios/wiki/Changelog#322-november-28-2017
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/290229

Twitter Kit for iOS versions 3.0 to 3.2.1 is vulnerable to a callback
verification flaw in the "Login with Twitter" component allowing an
attacker to provide alternate credentials. In the final step of "Login
with Twitter" authentication information is passed back to the
application using the registered custom URL scheme (typically
twitterkit-<consumer-key>) on iOS. Because the callback handler did
not verify the authenticity of the response, this step is vulnerable
to forgery, potentially allowing attacker to associate a Twitter
account with a third-party service.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0912
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: MISC:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/UCRM/New-UCRM-upgrades-available-2-8-2-and-2-9-0-beta3/td-p/2211814

Ubiquiti UCRM versions 2.5.0 to 2.7.7 are vulnerable to Stored Cross-
site Scripting. Due to the lack sanitization, it is possible to inject
arbitrary HTML code by manipulating the uploaded filename. Successful
exploitation requires valid credentials to an account with "Edit"
access to "Scheduling".


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0913
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: MISC:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/UCRM/New-UCRM-upgrades-available-2-8-2-and-2-9-0-beta3/td-p/2211814
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/301406

Ubiquiti UCRM versions 2.3.0 to 2.7.7 allow an authenticated user to
read arbitrary files in the local file system. Note that by default,
the local file system is isolated in a docker container. Successful
exploitation requires valid credentials to an account with "Edit"
access to "System Customization".

None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0932
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX-Updates-Blog/EdgeMAX-EdgeRouter-software-security-release-v1-9-7-hotfix-3/ba-p/2054117

Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1.1 and prior suffer from an
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability due to the lack of

None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0933
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX-Updates-Blog/EdgeMAX-EdgeRouter-software-release-v1-9-1-1/ba-p/1910524
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/240098

Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1 and prior suffer from a Cross-
Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability. An attacker with access to
an operator (read-only) account could lure an admin (root) user to
access the attacker-controlled page, allowing the attacker to gain
admin privileges in the system.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0934
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX-Updates-Blog/EdgeMAX-EdgeRouter-software-release-v1-9-1-1/ba-p/1910524
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/241044

Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1 and prior suffer from an
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability due to the lack of
protection of the file system leading to sensitive information being
exposed. An attacker with access to an operator (read-only) account
could escalate privileges to admin (root) access in the system.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0935
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX-Updates-Blog/EdgeMAX-EdgeRouter-software-security-release-v1-9-7-hotfix-3/ba-p/2054117
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/242407

Ubiquiti Networks EdgeOS version 1.9.1.1 and prior suffer from an
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability due to the lack of
protection of the file system leading to sensitive information being
exposed. An attacker with access to an operator (read-only) account
could escalate privileges to admin (root) access in the system.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-0936
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://nextcloud.com/security/advisory/?id=nc-sa-2018-001
Reference: MISC:https://hackerone.com/reports/297751

Nextcloud Server before 11.0.7 and 12.0.5 suffers from an
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability. A
missing ownership check allowed logged-in users to change the scope of
app passwords of other users. Note that the app passwords themselves
where neither disclosed nor could the error be misused to identify as
another user.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20161130)
Reference: MISC:https://community.ubnt.com/t5/airMAX-Updates-Blog/airOS-v6-0-7-Has-Been-Released/ba-p/2056522

Denial of Service attack in airMAX < 8.3.2 , airMAX < 6.0.7 and
EdgeMAX < 1.9.7 allow attackers to use the Discovery Protocol in
amplification attacks.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-10000
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170621)
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2017-3236622.html
Reference: SECTRACK:1038941
Reference: URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1038941

Vulnerability in the Oracle Hospitality Reporting and Analytics
component of Oracle Hospitality Applications (subcomponent:
Reporting). Supported versions that are affected are 8.5.1 and 9.0.0.
Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with
network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Hospitality Reporting and
Analytics. While the vulnerability is in Oracle Hospitality Reporting
and Analytics, attacks may significantly impact additional products.
Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized
ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS)
of Oracle Hospitality Reporting and Analytics. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.7
(Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:
(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:N/I:N/A:H).


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: none.
Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA.  This issue lacks
details and  cannot be determined if it is a security issue or not.
Notes: none.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000001
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170710)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://github.com/fedora-infra/fedmsg/blob/0.18.2/CHANGELOG.rst

FedMsg 0.18.1 and older is vulnerable to a message validation flaw
resulting in message validation not being enabled if configured to be
on.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000002
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170710)
Reference: BID:99599
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/99599
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.atutor.ca/atutor/mantis/changelog_page.php?version_id=55
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.atutor.ca/atutor/mantis/view.php?id=5681

ATutor versions 2.2.1 and earlier are vulnerable to a directory
traversal and file extension check bypass in the Course component
resulting in code execution. ATutor versions 2.2.1 and earlier are
vulnerable to a directory traversal vulnerability in the Course Icon
component resulting in information disclosure.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000003
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170710)
Reference: BID:99599
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/99599
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.atutor.ca/atutor/mantis/changelog_page.php?version_id=55
Reference: CONFIRM:http://www.atutor.ca/atutor/mantis/view.php?id=5681

ATutor versions 2.2.1 and earlier are vulnerable to an incorrect
access control check vulnerability in the Social Application component
resulting in privilege escalation. ATutor versions 2.2.1 and earlier
are vulnerable to an incorrect access control check vulnerability in
the Module component resulting in privilege escalation. ATutor
versions 2.2.1 and earlier are vulnerable to a incorrect access
control check vulnerability in the Alternative Content component
resulting in privilege escalation.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

information disclosure, database modification, or potential code
execution.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000020
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170710)
Reference: MISC:http://ecos.sourceware.org/ecos/problemreport.html

SYN Flood or FIN Flood attack in ECos 1 and other versions embedded
devices results in web Authentication Bypass. "eCos Embedded Web
Servers used by Multiple Routers and Home devices, while sending SYN
Flood or FIN Flood packets fails to validate and handle the packets
and does not ask for any sign of authentication resulting in
Authentication Bypass. An attacker can take complete advantage of this
bug and take over the device remotely or locally. The bug has been
successfully tested and reproduced in some versions of SOHO Routers
manufactured by TOTOLINK, GREATEK and others."

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000084

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000085
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170713)
Reference: BID:99574
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/99574
Reference: CONFIRM:https://jenkins.io/security/advisory/2017-07-10/

Subversion Plugin connects to a user-specified Subversion repository
as part of form validation (e.g. to retrieve a list of tags). This
functionality improperly checked permissions, allowing any user with
Item/Build permission (but not Item/Configure) to connect to any web
server or Subversion server and send credentials with a known ID,
thereby possibly capturing them. Additionally, this functionality did
not require POST requests be used, thereby allowing the above to be
performed without direct access to Jenkins via Cross-Site Request
Forgery attacks.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000086
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170713)
Reference: BID:100437
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/100437
Reference: CONFIRM:https://jenkins.io/security/advisory/2017-07-10/

The Periodic Backup Plugin did not perform any permission checks,
allowing any user with Overall/Read access to change its settings,
trigger backups, restore backups, download backups, and also delete
all previous backups via log rotation. Additionally, the plugin was
not requiring requests to its API be sent via POST, thereby opening
itself to Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.

GitHub Branch Source Plugin connects to a user-specified GitHub API

(e.g. to verify Scan Credentials are correct). This functionality

the above to be performed without direct access to Jenkins via Cross-

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000092
Status: Candidate

with job configuration permissions into following a link with a

client sending the username and password to an attacker-controlled
server.

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000093
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170713)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://jenkins.io/security/advisory/2017-07-10/

Poll SCM Plugin was not requiring requests to its API be sent via
POST, thereby opening itself to Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.
This allowed attackers to initiate polling of projects with a known
name. While Jenkins in general does not consider polling to be a
protection-worthy action as it's similar to cache invalidation, the
plugin specifically adds a permission to be able to use this
functionality, and this issue undermines that permission.


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)

======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000095
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170713)
Reference: CONFIRM:https://jenkins.io/security/advisory/2017-07-10/

The default whitelist included the following unsafe entries:
DefaultGroovyMethods.putAt(Object, String, Object);
DefaultGroovyMethods.getAt(Object, String). These allowed
circumventing many of the access restrictions implemented in the
script sandbox by using e.g. currentBuild['rawBuild'] rather than
currentBuild.rawBuild. Additionally, the following entries allowed
accessing private data that would not be accessible otherwise due to
script security: groovy.json.JsonOutput.toJson(Closure);
groovy.json.JsonOutput.toJson(Object).


Current Votes:
None (candidate not yet proposed)


======================================================
Name: CVE-2017-1000096
Status: Candidate
Phase: Assigned(20170713)
Reference: BID:99571
Reference: URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/99571
Reference: CONFIRM:https://jenkins.io/security/advisory/2017-07-10/

Arbitrary code execution due to incomplete sandbox protection:
Constructors, instance variable initializers, and instance
initializers in Pipeline scripts were not subject to sandbox
protection, and could therefore execute arbitrary code. This could be
exploited e.g. by regular Jenkins users with the permission to
configure Pipelines in Jenkins, or by trusted committers to
repositories containing Jenkinsfiles.
